title: Type and Media 08/09 group archive site now online!
content:
I am happy to finally announce our finished website:  
 [http://typemedia09.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817200405/http:/typemedia09.com/ "http://typemedia09.com/")

and the article about the Type and Media master course at KABK:  
 [http://ilovetypography.com/2009/11/20/the-right-type-of-education/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817200405/http:/ilovetypography.com/2009/11/20/the-right-type-of-education/ "http://ilovetypography.com/2009/11/20/the-right-type-of-education/")
author: DizajnDesign
